doc:
Adrienne Barbeau https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adrienne_Barbeau 0 Adrienne Jo Barbeau (born June 11, 1945) is an American actress, singer and the author of three books. Barbeau came to prominence in the 1970s as Broadway's original Rizzo in the musical Grease, and as Carol Traynor, the divorced daughter of Maude Findlay (played by Beatrice Arthur) on the sitcom Maude (1972–1978). In 1980 she began appearing in horror and science fiction films, including The Fog (1980), Creepshow (1982), Swamp Thing (1982) and Escape from New York (1981). Other films included: Back to School (1986) and Argo (2012). During the 1990s, she became known for providing the voice of Catwoman on Batman: The Animated Series (1992–1995), and subsequent Batman cartoon series. In the 2000s, she appeared on the HBO series Carnivàle as Ruthie the snake dancer. Adrienne_Jo_Barbeau ( born June_11_,_1945 ) is an_American_actress , singer and the_author of three_books . Barbeau came to prominence in the_1970s as Broadway 's_original_Rizzo in the_musical_Grease , and as Carol_Traynor , the_divorced_daughter of Maude_Findlay (_played by Beatrice_Arthur_) on the_sitcom Maude_(_1972 – 1978_) . In 1980 she began_appearing in horror_and_science_fiction_films , including The_Fog_(_1980_) , Creepshow_(_1982_) , Swamp Thing_(_1982_)_and_Escape from New_York ( 1981_) . Other_films included : Back to School_(_1986_)_and_Argo_(_2012_) . During the_1990s , she became known for providing the_voice of Catwoman on Batman : The_Animated_Series_(_1992 – 1995_) , and subsequent_Batman_cartoon_series . In the_2000s , she appeared on the_HBO_series_Carnivàle as Ruthie the_snake_dancer .
